overview: Take a trip with Adam Hills and his sell-out crowd at London’s Hammersmith Apollo to the Clown Heart of comedy. In this live recording Adam and his willing participant audience literally get to the meat and two veg of modern life. Along the way he embraces love, life and death with his inimitable positivity, laughing in the face of disaster and “Kicking cancer in the d**k”.
title: Adam Hills: Clown Heart Live
